property.name: intSeqNo_Query
property.value: select int_seq_no from job_queue_run where jobid=? and (report_type=' ' or report_type is null) order by dprog

property.name: darout_Query
property.value: select lasera, darout from job_queue_out where jobq_seq_no=? order by user_seq_no

property.name: jobID_Query
property.value: select jobid, instcd, dprog, catlyt, rundate, userid from job_queue_run where UPPER(stuno)=? and (report_type=' ' or report_type is null) and complete != 'D' and instidq = ? and instid = ? order by int_seq_no desc

property.name: stunos_Query
property.value: select sm.stuno, dm.stuname from stu_master sm, stu_demo dm where UPPER(stuno) like ? and sm.instidq = ? and sm.instid = ? and sm.int_seq_no = dm.stu_mast_no order by stuno

property.name: stuname_Query
property.value: select sm.stuno, dm.stuname from stu_master sm, stu_demo dm where UPPER(stuname) like ? and sm.instidq = ? and sm.instid = ? and sm.int_seq_no = dm.stu_mast_no order by stuname

property.name: insertInto_JQL
property.value: insert into job_queue_list (instidq, instid, instcd, jobid, userid, status, priority, servername, comkey, log_level, report_type) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

property.name: insertInto_JQD
property.value: insert into job_queue_detail (INSTIDQ, INSTID, INSTCD, JOBID, USERID, USER_SEQ_NO, STUNO,EVALSW,COMKEY,SOPRID) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

property.name: auditStatus_Query
property.value: select status from job_queue_list where jobid = ?

property.name: update_JQL
property.value: update job_queue_list set status = 'N' where jobid = ?

property.name: gpa_Query
property.value: select GOTGPA, GOTGPAHRS, GOTGPAPTS from job_queue_req where jobq_seq_no = ? and (total_hour = 'T' or total_gpa = 'T')

property.name: secondary_Gpa_Query
property.value: select GOTGPAHRS, GOTGPAPTS, GOTGPA from job_queue_req where jobq_seq_no = ? and GOTGPAHRS = (select max(GOTGPAHRS) from job_queue_req where jobq_seq_no = ?) and GOTGPAHRS != '0'
